thread.section_title: Hotel Da Vinci & Spa - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: great location
thread.title_full: great location - Review of Hotel Da Vinci & Spa, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: searchin4cats
title: great location
text:
stayed here for a last minute trip to Paris for 4 nights. Hotel's location is great as its close to museums and other central sight seeing locations in Paris. Also the RER train is close by which you can take to visit the Versailles.
The room was lovely and it came with the balcony which overlooked the street. Lots of restaurants/cafes near by.
Their spa is nice and you can book it by asking staff. its a nice size pool for 2-3 people and you can take the elevator straight to the basement where its located and then back to your floor once done.
Staff was very friendly as well. They gave us good recommendations and booked restaurants for us.
would definitely consider staying here again in the future!
